response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist denn das noch mal?" 😒 ich frage mich, ob es today noch menschen gibt, die ihr persönliches daten really schützen wollen. 🤔 it's like, every time i sign up for a new app or service, they ask me for my whole life story. 🙄 and don't even get me started on those data breaches! 😱 has anyone ever heard of data minimization? 🤷‍♀️ it's like, the less you have, the less you can lose, right? 😅 but no, instead we get bombarded with targeted ads and whatnot. 🙄 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalageproblems"
